com.conceptwave.scripting
Class BasketItem

com.conceptwave.scripting.Object
  com.conceptwave.scripting.CWScriptable
      com.conceptwave.scripting.CwObject
          com.conceptwave.scripting.OrderItem
              com.conceptwave.scripting.Document
                  com.conceptwave.scripting.DynamicDocumentBase
                      com.conceptwave.scripting.BasketItem

public class BasketItem
extends DynamicDocumentBase

A dynamic document that represent an instance of a basket item at run-time in the order entry system, service inventory, etc. This is a data object Do not mix it with the class CwcCatalogItem that represent the Catalog definition (metadata) for this item The basket item has always the same fixed part - i.e. its implementation is one table, which eventually may be extended by the user, and a variable part stored in the same NVP table. This way all basket items are same from Designer view point but different from Catalog view point. Replaces 4.2 CwfJSOffer and CwfJsProduct classes

 String status
          READONLY: Returns the memory status of the item as string which can be one of the "ADDED", "REMOVED" or "EXISTING"
 String type
          READONLY: returns the catalog item type of this basket item

Constructor Detail

BasketItem

public BasketItem(Basket theBasket,
                  String itemCode,
                  String parentId,
                  String relationName,
                  Date requestTime)
Creates a new basket item instance

Parameters:
theBasket - The basket object
itemCode - Item code of the basket item
parentId - String Optional parent basket item id. If specified, the new basket item will be created as a child of the parent
relationName - String Optional relation name. Specifies the relation between parent and child basket items
requestTime - The request time
Method Detail

addNewCharge

public BasketCharge addNewCharge(BasketCharge bCharge)
add the new charge from the newChargeList to the basketItem

Parameters:
the - basketCharge to be added and uc The context
Returns:
bCharge if the basketCharge is found in the newChargeList and successfully added, false if there is no such basketCharge in the newChargeList

applyRestrictions

public void applyRestrictions(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreContainedItems,
                              com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean ignoreEligibilityError)
Applies the restrictions on item-item relations - Scriptable method

cloneBasketItem

public BasketItem cloneBasketItem(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean keepID)
The function clone the current basketItem by using copy constructor. It allows either keep the basketitem id or create new id depends on the input parameter keepID

Parameters:
keepID - Indicates if the same ID will be used (Clone) or not (Copy)
Returns:
CwcBasketItem which is a copy/clone of the basket item

createBasketCharge

public BasketCharge createBasketCharge(String chargeTypeCode,
                                       Number price)
The API will create and add the basket charge to the basket item using the input external chargetype code and price, and it will return the created CwcBasketCharge.

Parameters:
chargeTypeCode - represents the charge type code of the external charge created
price - represents the price value obtained from external system
Returns:
CwcBasketCharge

createItemRelation

public Document createItemRelation(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object relatedItem,
                                   String relationType)
Adds a new relation of given type between this basket item and a specified related object. The related object can be basket item or string identifier of other type of object

Parameters:
relatedItem - The basket item or related id (string)
relationType - The relation type code (string)
Returns:
The relation document (cwt_pcoe:basketItemRelation)

Notes: When the related item is passed in as a string, it does not have to be a valid basket item ID. In this case, the ID will be considered as an "external ID", which implies the relationship is from this item to an external entity that is not in this basket.

findItemRelation

public Document findItemRelation(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object relatedItem,
                                 String relationType)
Finds a relation of given relation type between this basket item and a related object. The source and the related object can be basket items or string identifiers of other type of objects.

Parameters:
relatedItem - Basket item or related id (string)
relationType - Relation type code (string)
Returns:
The relation document or null if a relation is not found

getAllChildren

public Array getAllChildren(com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean recursive)
Returns all children or descendants of the basket item

Parameters:
recursive - If false, returns only the children of this basket item. If true, returns all descendants of the basket item - i.e. the children, the grand children, etc.
Returns:
An array of basket items that are children or descendants of this basket item.

getAssociations

public CatalogItemItem[] getAssociations(String[] types,
                                         com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean checkAvailability)
Gets a list of item-item associations for this basketitem. The resultset will be filtered based on the types or whether availability rules are checked. The invoking basket item will be assigned to theItem and the corresponding catalog item will be assigned to theCatalogItem during execution of the API.

Parameters:
types - Array of item association types for filtering. If null, all item associations of this item will be returned
checkAvailability - If true, availability rule will be checked. If false, rule is not checked. If input is null, availability rule will not be checked
Returns:
A list of item-item associations for the catalog item corresponding to the basket item

getAttributeCodeTableRestriction

public String getAttributeCodeTableRestriction(String itemAttributeCode)
If the item attribute references a code table type and there is a restriction on the list of code table codes, this method returns the list of codes defined in the restriction as a comma separated string.

Parameters:
itemAttributeCode - item attribute code (string)
Returns:
Returns the list of codes as comma separated string, if found. If not found, returns null.

getAttributeDefaultValue

public String getAttributeDefaultValue(String itemAttributeCode)
Given the item attribute code returns the default value for the item attribute. All the applicable rules and restrictions on the item attribute are applied in order to get the default value. If item attribute is a property, then null will be return.

Parameters:
itemAttributeCode - item attribute code (string)
Returns:
Returns the default value if found. Returns null if no value is found.

getBasket

public Basket getBasket()
Gets the basket object

Returns:
Returns basket object of this basket item.

getCharges

public Array getCharges()
Returns the list of charges for this basket item

Returns:
The list of charges for this item as an array of CwcBasketCharge objects. If there are no charges, returns null.

getSourceRelations

public Array getSourceRelations()
Returns all basket relations whose target is this basket item

Returns:
The array of relation documents (cwt_pcoe:basketItemRelation) or null if no relation is found

getTargetRelations

public Array getTargetRelations()
Returns all basket relations whose source is this basket item

Returns:
The array of relation documents (cwt_pcoe:basketItemRelation) or null if no relation is found

populateDefaults

public void populateDefaults()
Applies the default values for the attributes of this basket item

price

public void price(String[] currencies)
Calculates prices for this basket item. Once a basket item has been priced, user can use the getCharges() method to get the list of charges applied on this basket item.

Parameters:
currencies - represents the list of currencies code. For example, CAD. The list of currencies will be used to filter the charges that will be included in the pricing.

removeCharge

public com.conceptwave.scripting.Boolean removeCharge(com.conceptwave.scripting.Object bChargeIdOrObj)
remove a charge from the basketItem

Parameters:
the - basketCharge to be removed and uc The context
Returns:
True if the basketCharge is found, false if there is no such basketCharge in the basketItem
